W/A/S/D – tawa lukin
nena teje pi ilo tawa – tawa/nena
nena soto pi ilo tawa – lawa jan la, o (awen) nena
sike pi ilo tawa – lili/suli lukin
TAB – tenpo pi tenpo suli (moku pi telo kili li suli)
I / F – poki
R - lawa pi jan ale
1–9 – lawa pi jan nanpa
Spacebar – pini tawa
E – tawa lukin li tawa jan lawa
Q – wawa jan la, tawa sike
